alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 9:42PM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with local accumulations up to 6 inches from the base to the top of Casper Mountain. North wind gusting 20 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday, although much of the snow will have ended by shortly after midnight Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous road conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
